code: import React from'react';import{Box,Typography,LinearProgress,Paper}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BudgetProgress=()=>{const budgetData={total:50000,spent:35000,remaining:15000,categories:[{name:'Housing',spent:12000,budget:15000},{name:'Food',spent:8000,budget:10000},{name:'Transportation',spent:5000,budget:8000},{name:'Entertainment',spent:4000,budget:5000},{name:'Savings',spent:6000,budget:12000}]};const overallProgress=budgetData.spent/budgetData.total*100;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{p:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",gutterBottom:true,children:"Overall Budget Progress"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{mb:3},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',mb:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body2",children:["Spent: \u20B9",budgetData.spent.toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body2",children:["Remaining: \u20B9",budgetData.remaining.toLocaleString()]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LinearProgress,{variant:"determinate",value:overallProgress,sx:{height:10,borderRadius:5}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h6",gutterBottom:true,children:"Category Breakdown"}),budgetData.categories.map(category=>{const progress=category.spent/category.budget*100;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{sx:{p:2,mb:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'space-between',mb:1},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"body2",children:category.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"body2",children:["\u20B9",category.spent.toLocaleString()," / \u20B9",category.budget.toLocaleString()]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LinearProgress,{variant:"determinate",value:progress,sx:{height:8,borderRadius:4}})]},category.name);})]});};export default BudgetProgress;
